comment: He REALLY knew what he was talking about. You have to read from selected pieces a little bit but it's worth it because you actually learn things you've never considered before. The man is hilarious and was a great professor. Made sure we understood everything and had very casual quizzes each week and tests (just a midterm and final). Great guy.

Very straight forward. Read the assigned reading, go to the lectures, take good notes, and you will pass without a doubt. He does give tests, discussions, and extra credit. The tests are really easy if you go to class and read. He is really nice and really understanding.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lecture heavy

comment: Professor Horowitz was the best professor I had this semester. He's funny and engaging, I actually looked forward to lectures. The class was easy. I learned a lot of actually valuable information that I will keep with me through life from this class as well, seriously loved this class and the professor.

Professor Horowitz is just awesome! He makes his lectures super interesting and he actually cares about his students. If you have any issues just go up and talk to him. Make sure you do the readings and you will do great. He is one of the best professors Ive had yet. He talks about food a LOT so make sure you eat something before class haha.

I loved Professor Horowitz; his classes were enjoyable and he was a personable guy! He was funny and really cares about his students. During COVID-19 he checked up on us regularly and made things less stressful. We learned a lot about the impacts of society on race, gender, and sexuality in this class. I throughly enjoyed the lectures.

He is an amazing professor. The class is very interesting and his lectures are hilarious. There isn't much work in the class besides reading, discussion posts, easy pop quizzes, and two easy tests. He goes over all the information multiple times and gives you all the resources needed to ace the class.

He's an awesome prof and wants you to be involved in class. You HAVE to do the readings because he will call you out on it. There are pop quizzes, so just do your homework. He made class super interesting and funny. He is very understanding if you're in a touch situation and will work with you. Tests are not super hard. Remember: Zaxby's over CFA.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Best professor ever! There are readings but its from an actual book instead of a textbook and are often pretty interesting. attendance is not mandatory but there are pop quizzes. there were no tests other than the midterm and final and he offers multiple extra credit opportunities throughout the semester. 12/10 recommend

Professor Horowitz is AMAZING!!! You should definitely take him if you want to broaden your knowledge about race and gender. It's really interesting and makes you think. I loved every moment in this class. 10 quizzes, one question. It's pretty straightforward from the readings. The readings aren't bad. Two exams.

MY FAV PROFESSOR! This class does focus more on race and gender than love and sex, but it is so worth it. Daniel makes the class interesting and fun, and actually engages us. He loves to joke around, so class is always enjoyable. I love this class because you can see the connection between the material and our lives. And not too much work!

If you're looking for an actual class about Love and Sex he is not the professor for you! He changed the curriculum to make the class only about Gender and Feminism, which is an interesting topic that he taught well, but not what I signed up for. However, he's a great professor and the class is really easy to pass if you just show up and read.

He knows what he is talking about. He gives great lectures, open to discussions and other opinions. Only complaint is that he holds back all of your grades. Even with less than a month left in the semester, he hadn't posted any of our grades, making it difficult to know our progress in the class

One of the cool professors. Only need to do a few short readings every week then come back to discuss them in class. Will need the books but can get cheap on amazon. Don't be fooled- this guy knows what he's talking about. He's really funny!! Always able to relate the topics to current events and creates a safe atmosphere to talk about anything.
